revised_title: Investigating the Cytoplasmic Inclusions and Yolk Formation in Ciona Intestinalis Eggs
tldr: The author examines the cytoplasmic inclusions and yolk formation in the eggs of Ciona intestinalis during oogenesis and fertilization. They study the role of the Golgi apparatus in yolk formation and its relation to other cellular components. The research provides insights into the complex processes of yolk formation and the development of the egg.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Cell Biology
